summary: REQ-8 asks to explicitly default `Listing.propertyStatus` to `#available` in every listing-creation code path in `backend/main.mo`. The diff snippet shows the `PropertyStatus` type and `Listing.propertyStatus` field definition, but the provided truncated diff does not show any listing-creation functions or record-construction sites where `propertyStatus = #available` is actually set. An additional modification to `project_state.json` appears unrelated to the requested backend-only defaulting change.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure that every code path that creates a new `Listing` record in `backend/main.mo` explicitly sets `propertyStatus` to `#available` at creation time (so newly created listings never have an unset or non-available initial `propertyStatus`).
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated `backend/main.mo` diff shows the `propertyStatus : PropertyStatus` field exists on `Listing`, but does not provide evidence of any listing creation/insert/update code paths explicitly assigning `propertyStatus = #available` when constructing new `Listing` records (including any demo/seed logic).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project metadata describing broader PropertyStatus system and frontend-related features in `project_state.json`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest constraints emphasize keeping logic in `backend/main.mo` and only setting the initial default on listing creation; updating `project_state.json` is not requested as part of REQ-8.
